About Mat

I do not like talking about myself so:

Matúš Frick is a graduate of applied physics at Palacky university.
He did not finish his master's degree but learned to use Python and Math.

He started a Moon monitoring and mapping company with his best friend! He had a lot of fun.

He worked at BOOT!Q as data analyst. He got his hands around PowerBi, Tableau, Machine learning and Data warehouse building.

He is Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Scientist Associate.

In his free time, he creates the endgame keyboard. He rices his Linux distro and lives in the D&D world. Stay tuned! D&D blog incoming.
